column4: I got it from a friend of mine and it had windows XP on it. I can't remember if it made noise then or not
No it does not play any sounds at all
I don't see any keyboard keys that make the sound go up and down.. the icon is there but nothing is coming out of the speakers
have you tried the alsa mixer?
I like your name.. I tried the alsa mixer and set everything that was mute to on and moved the volume up
Still got no sound. I did get a little lost when they were talking about loading drivers.
I did but still nothing unless I did something wrong
do you know what sound chipset/card you have?
did this recently stop working or never worked?
I got the laptop from a friend and he claims it worked but I am starting to think it didn't work at all He had windows xp loaded on it and I put ubuntu on it right away
it shows the card but I can't get any sound at all
that chipset should work. i had some issues with mine doing surround sound after the last update but it works now
do you think it is a bad sound card?
cant say for sure. you could boot with a live disk and see if it works there as well
It didn't work when I had the live disk I thought it was just me so I loaded it anyway
just run through some of the steps on that link. make sure its get the right output like digital or analog and the sort
